purpose: The email announces the call for papers for the 2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins (EDTconf 2025), which will take place on October 6â€“7, 2025, in Michigan, US. The conference aims to gather researchers and practitioners to discuss the systematic development of Digital Twins across various domains. It outlines important dates for abstract and paper submissions, as well as topics of interest for potential submissions. Additionally, it provides submission guidelines and mentions an opportunity for selected best papers to be invited for extended publication in a journal.

conf_name_candidates.raw: 2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins
conf_name_candidates.evidence: We are excited to share the call for papers, to the International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins.

evidence_sentences: We are excited to share the call for papers, to the International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins.
2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins (EDTconf 2025) - Call for Papers -
EDTconf 2025 aims to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to shape the future of engineering DTs in a systematic, scalable, and principled way.
Topics of interest include (but are not limited to):
Regular Papers (max 10+2 pages): Novel research contributions with substantive evaluation.
Authors of selected regular papers will be invited to submit extended versions to the Journal on Software and Systems Modeling (SoSyM), with at least 30% new material required.
